body:
Most PHP frameworks are characterized by being comprehensive and very powerful, with a steep learning curve. The purpose of the Mivik framework is to provide a solid, reliable, valuable MVC framework that manages the lifecycle of an html request using a front-controller model. 

Mivik does not include any baked in logging, database access, ORM, or any other type functions. You are free to choose your own. Instead, Mivik provides structure to your application, gives hooks to include any resources you'd like in an organized way, and helpers to manage your content and templates.
name: Mivik
tagline: MiViK is an open-source, light-weigh PHP MVC framework
